name: Smart
description: Smart Token is the native utility token used at Presale Money launchpad platform. SMART holders are able to stake those tokens and gets rewards based on transactions and Presale Money earnings. Presale Money is a launchpad platform that provides fundraising opportunities to new project creators. There are multiple services for new investors and project owners. These are: Presale Creation, Token Vesting, LP Locking. Presale Money is one of the most stable launchpad on Fantom Network. In total, more than 1.600.000 FTM was raised for new projects launched on Presale Money. Since SMART is the native utility token of Presale Money, most of the fees of the provided services are distributed to SMART stakers by the Smart Contracts. Thus, stakers earn extra rewards from outside the token ecosystem. The main advantage of SMART to other tokens, since it is not inflationary, the rewards distributed by Presale Money fees don't affect the price negatively.
